data.description: <p>Please note this posting is to advertise potential job opportunities. This exact role may not be open today but could open in the near future. When you apply, a Cisco representative may contact you directly if a relevant position opens.</p><p></p><p></p><div><div><p><span><span>Applications are accepted until further notice. </span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p></p></div><div><p><b><span>Meet the Team </span></b><span> </span></p><p></p></div><div><p><span><span>Cisco Security Customer Experience (CX) organization supports customers through the entire lifecycle of a security solution: from understanding business needs to deploying custom solutions, from </span><span>optimizing</span><span> existing solutions to developing applications that meets specific needs; from helping customers to </span><span>maintain</span><span> their solution</span></span><span><span>s to helping them investigate poten</span></span><span><span>tial security incidents. As a Security Consulting Engineer Intern, you will be able to interact with customers and learn how Cisco plan, design, deploy and </span><span>optimize</span><span> Security Solution while </span><span>acquiring</span><span> the technical and consultative skills </span><span>required</span><span> to accurately delight Cisco customers. During the internship you will also </span><span>have the opportunity to</span><span> interact with other Cisco organizations and learn how they contribute to </span><span>enable</span><span> our customers to achieve their business goals. </span></span><span> </span></p><p></p></div><div><p><b><span>Your Impact </span></b><span> </span></p><p></p></div><div><p><span><span>Everything is converging on the Internet, making networked connections more relevant than ever. Our employees have groundbreaking ideas that impact everything imaginable - from entertainment, retail, healthcare, and education, to public and private sectors, smart cities, smart cars, and everyday devices in our homes. Here, that means </span><span>you’ll</span><span> take creative ideas from the drawing board to powerful solutions that have real world impact. </span><span>You’ll</span><span> collaborate with Cisco leaders, partner with expert mentors, and develop incredible relationships with colleagues who share your interest in connecting the unconnected. </span><span>You’ll</span><span> be part of a team that cares about its customers, enjoys having fun, and </span><span>you’ll</span><span> </span><span>participate</span><span> in changing the lives of those in our local communities. Come prepared to be inspired. </span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>You will attend on-site design and configuration sessions with a Security Consulting mentor </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>You will collect requirements from customers for projects to meet critical business goals </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>You will work with a team mentor to define the business goals and requirements for integration efforts </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>You will aid in analyzing and designing policy creation for Identity Services, Firewalls, Visibility </span><span>Solutions</span><span> and Cloud-based solutions. </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>You will analyze customer configurations and provide feedback on </span><span>possible improvements</span><span> to the configuration to improve alignment with customer business goals </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>You will learn and understand Security Policies, Standards, Procedures and Guidelines </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>You will be able to </span><span>demonstrate</span><span> programming languages (Java/Python/C++) and </span><span>open source</span><span> automation platforms (Ansible/Chef/Terraform) to develop tailor-made automation capabilities to customers using Cisco application programming interfaces </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul><p></p></div><div><p><b><span>Minimum Qualifications </span></b><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Currently enrolled in a certification program (e.g., Boot Camp, Apprenticeship, Community College</span><span>), or</span><span> currently enrolled in an undergraduate degree program. Relevant fields </span><span>include:</span><span> in Information Systems, Cyber Security, Computer Networking, Computer Science or Engineering </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Knowledge of IT systems, networking concepts, TCP/IP protocols, network </span><span>devices</span><span> and applications, OSI 7-layer model, or code development </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Able to legally live and work in the country for which </span><span>you’re</span><span> applying, without visa support or sponsorship </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><b><span>Preferred Qualifications </span></b><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>A desire and passion for Information Security and willingness to learn and guide yourself tough concepts </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div></div><div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Able to work well in small dynamic teams and balance multiple responsibilities </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>The ability and desire to work on collaborative teams across the US </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Comfortable handling ambiguity and unknowns associated with technical projects </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Self-motivated individual that feels comfortable working on remote teams </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Possess excellent written and verbal skills</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div></div><p></p><h1>Why Cisco? </h1><p>At Cisco, we’re revolutionizing how data and infrastructure connect and protect organizations in the AI era – and beyond. We’ve been innovating fearlessly for 40 years to create solutions that power how humans and technology work together across the physical and digital worlds. These solutions provide customers with unparalleled security, visibility, and insights across the entire digital footprint.</p><p>Fueled by the depth and breadth of our technology, we experiment and create meaningful solutions. Add to that our worldwide network of doers and experts, and you’ll see that the opportunities to grow and build are limitless. We work as a team, collaborating with empathy to make really big things happen on a global scale. Because our solutions are everywhere, our impact is everywhere. </p><p>We are Cisco, and our power starts with you. </p><p></p>
